text: Everyone who has a friend they've known for over 10 years.
Everyone who considers their friends as 'chosen family'.
Everyone who has had a falling out with a close friend.
Everyone who believes quality over quantity when it comes to friends.
Everyone who has a friend group with an active group chat.
Everyone who has traveled with friends.
Everyone who would drop everything to help a friend in need.
Everyone who has made a new close friend as an adult.
Everyone who has a friend that lives in a different country.
